details.content: PM Modi and Donald Trump will address over 50,000 Indian-Americans at the 'Howdy Modi' event. The three hour long event is scheduled to be held at the NRG Stadium in Houston.

details.title: Sikh Community in Houston thanked PM Modi for Kartarpur Corridor
details.content:
Here is now the Sikh community in Houston welcomed PM @narendramodi.

The Prime Minister interacted with the members of the community, during which they congratulated PM Modi on some of the pathbreaking decisions taken by the Government of India. pic.twitter.com/P3Y3qU0b1n

— PMO India (@PMOIndia) September 22, 2019
Crowds started gathering at NRG Stadium in Houston where PM Modi and President Trump will address Indian-Americans in the Howdy, Modi event.

details.title: Drums being played at NRG stadium in Houston, Texas where PM Modi is scheduled to speak
details.content:
#WATCH Drums being played at NRG stadium in Houston, Texas. PM Modi to speak at the venue later today. #HowdyModi pic.twitter.com/TwnmXHq2Av

— ANI (@ANI) September 22, 2019

details.title: POTUS en route Houston
details.content:
Joint Base Andrews (Maryland): President of the United States, Donald Trump emplanes for Houston. He will attend #HowdyModi event, later today. (Pic credit: Steve Herman, The Voice of America) pic.twitter.com/ZKUxiIuMYb

— ANI (@ANI) September 22, 2019

details.title: Teenage prodigy Sparsh Shah to sing Jana, Gana, Mana at 'Howdy Modi!'
details.content:
16-year-old Sparsh will sing Jana, Gana, Mana, the Indian national anthem, in front of 50,000 people at the NRG Stadium in Texas’ Houston, which has one of the largest concentration of more than 150,000 Indian-American community in the United States.

 

The big day has arrived...HowdyModi, here I come! Looking forward to singing the Indian National Anthem at this prestigious event in Houston, TX in the presence of Shri @narendramodi (ji), Mr. @realDonaldTrump, 50,000 audience members and 2 Billion viewers watching it live today pic.twitter.com/tuRCGIaX6P

— Sparsh Shah-Purhythm (@SparshPurhythm) 22 September 2019

details.title: 'Howdy Modi' biggest international gathering for any foreign leader in US after Pope?
details.content: As a cheerful crowd begins to settle down at Houston's NRG stadium in anticipation ahead of PM Modi's speech, the event expected to have a crowd of at least 50,000 people, is being termed as possibly the biggest international gathering in US for any foreign leader after Pope.

details.title: Trump to address crowd at 9:30 pm IST, Modi from 10:15pm
details.content: Trump will address the Indian diaspora at the "Howdy Modi: Shared Dreams, Bright Futures" event at 9:30 pm (IST), according to the White House, according to ANI.

The energy in the stadium is palpable as the crowd awaits Prime Minister Modi’s address #HowdyModi #SharedDreamsBrighterFutures pic.twitter.com/vUKmklCFrR

— Texas India Forum (@howdymodi) 22 September 2019

details.title: Texas Senator John Cornyn has arrived at NRG Stadium
details.content:
Senator @JohnCornyn is at @nrgpark! #HowdyModi pic.twitter.com/PpVbqWNtw7

— Texas India Forum (@howdymodi) 22 September 2019

details.title: The event begins with a Sikh Gurbani prayer from the Kirtan singers.
Will be in Houston to be with my friend, tweets Trump
details.content: Will be in Houston to be with my friend. Will be a great day in Texas: Donald Trump

details.title: WATCH | Dancers perform at Howdy Modi event
details.content:
#WATCH Dancers perform at #HowdyModi event in Houston. PM Narendra Modi and President Donald Trump to arrive shortly. pic.twitter.com/rlwP4WxueV

— ANI (@ANI) September 22, 2019

details.title: Indian-Americans believe 'Howdy, Modi' would take India-US ties to new level
details.content:
Indian-Americans here are very enthusiastic about Prime Minister Narendra Modi and US President Donald Trump jointly addressing a mega 'Howdy, Modi' rally, an event they believe would take the bilateral ties to a new level.

CLICK HERE TO READ MORE

details.title: PM Modi responds to Trump's tweet
details.content:
It surely will be a great day! Looking forward to meeting you very soon @realDonaldTrump. https://t.co/BSum4VyeFI

— Narendra Modi (@narendramodi) September 22, 2019

details.title: “Howdy Modi” event biggest gathering for foreign leader
details.content: The “Howdy Modi” event is the largest ever gathering for an elected foreign leader in US.
PM Narendra Modi arrives at NRG stadium in Houston. He will address the gathering shortly.

details.title: US lawmakers welcome PM Modi
details.content: 'India is largest democracy on face of earth&America is proud to be your friend. Today is also a celebration of the Indian-American community in USA including in Texas. We say thank you to you for your incredible contributions', said Junior US Senator for Texas,Ted Cruz.

details.title: PM Modi on stage
details.content:
Prime Minister Narendra Modi arrives on stage at NRG stadium in Houston, he will address the gathering shortly. #HowdyModi pic.twitter.com/PVOcMXcpce

— ANI (@ANI) September 22, 2019

details.title: 'Houston says Howdy in 140 languages'
details.content: Houston mayor Sylvester Turner says Houston is the most diverse city in the US.

details.title: Mayor of Houston presents Key to the City
details.content:
The Mayor of Houston @SylvesterTurner presents the Key to the City to @narendramodi as the mark of respect, solidarity and long standing India-Houston relationship. #HowdyModi pic.twitter.com/auLXorlxF6

— Texas India Forum (@howdymodi) September 22, 2019

details.title: That’s a Texas-sized crowd, tweets Raveesh Kumar
details.content:
That’s a Texas-sized crowd!

Electric atmosphere at the NRG arena in Houston as 50,000 strong Indian Americans wait for the historic occasion when PM @narendramodi comes on stage together with US President @realDonaldTrump at #HowdyModi. pic.twitter.com/upJj4pHphr

— Raveesh Kumar (@MEAIndia) September 22, 2019

details.title: House Majority Leader Steny Hoyer invokes Gandhi and Nehru
details.content: House Majority Leader Steny H. Hoyer says, India like America proud of its traditions to secure a future according to Gandhi's teachings and Nehru's vision of India as a secular democracy where respect for pluralism and human rights safeguard every individual.

details.title: Man dressed Gandhi says, Modi and Mahatma the same
details.content: Ramesh Modi, a man dressed as Mahatma Gandhi says Modi and Gandhi are the same. They are saints, fakirs. Gandhi was a fakir exactly as Modi.

details.title: Trump arrives at NRG stadium
details.content: US President Donald Trump arrives at the NRG stadium.

details.title: Modi, Trump greet each other
details.content: PM Modi and Donald Trump greeted each other prior to sharing the dais at NRG stadium.

details.title: Donald Trump and Prime Minister Narendra Modi on stage at NRG stadium in Houston
Honour and privilege to welcome Mr Trump: Modi
details.content: Narendra Modi begins his speech by praising Donald Trump. "Honour and privilege to welcome Mr Trump at this magnificent stadium and magnificent gathering," says PM Modi.
Trump begins his speech, wishes Modi happy birthday.

details.title: Relation between India and US stronger than before: Trump
details.content: Relation between India and US stronger than before. Under Modi's his leadership the world is witnessing a strong sovereign. India has lifted over 300 million people out of poverty, says Trump.

details.title: We love you, support you and will be with you every step ahead: Trump
details.content:
You never had a better friend than Trump in White House: President #DonaldTrump #HowdyModi pic.twitter.com/465zFvo30g

— All India Radio News (@airnewsalerts) September 22, 2019

details.title: Look forward to working with you, says Trump
details.content: Look forward to working with you to make our countries prosper than ever before. Our Constitutions also begin with three common words - We, the People: Trump

details.title: 'Working to eradicate Islamic terrorism'
details.content:
We are working to eradicate Islamic terrorism: President #DonaldTrump #HowdyModi pic.twitter.com/A5ylapMfwW

— All India Radio News (@airnewsalerts) September 22, 2019

details.title: Now, Prime Minister Modi begins his speech
details.content: Today we are witnessing history in the making. This energy in NRG is the proof of the increasing synergy between India and America, says Modi.

details.title: 'Everything is grand in Texas'
details.content:
PM Modi: This atmosphere is unprecedented & extraordinary, when you talk of Texas then everything is on a grand scale. I'm seeing history being made, and a new chemistry also. #HowdyModi #ModiInUSA pic.twitter.com/ZAHbSTlgy5

— ANI (@ANI) September 22, 2019

details.title: Unity in Diversity is our emblem: Modi
details.content: Unity in Diversity is our emblem. It is the basic fabric of our vibrant democracy. This is our power and our inspiration.The 50,000 Indians present in this stadium today are representatives of our great heritage: PM Modi

details.title: Recent elections showcased Indian democracy's greatness: Modi
details.content: Recent elections showcased Indian democracy's greatness across world, 61 crore people, twice US population, voted. The formation of New India is India’s biggest oath at the moment. We are competing with ourselves, challenging ourselve: PM Modi

details.title: 'Sab accha hai'
details.content:
#WATCH Prime Minister Narendra Modi says,'everything is fine,' in different Indian languages. pic.twitter.com/IpSKbGpTjg

— ANI (@ANI) September 22, 2019

details.title: India will bid farewell to open defecation: Modi
details.content: On the eve of Mahatma Gandhi's 150th birth anniversary, India will bid farewell to open defecation, says PM Modi.

details.title: It is an eruption
details.content: Modi receives the loudest applause as he rakes up Article 370. He says the people of J&K and Ladakh were bereft of development because of Article 370. He also asks the crowd to give a standing ovation to the Indian Parliamentarians for passing the bill. And there they go!

details.title: Modi slams Pakistan
details.content: "The 9/11 in the US or the Mumbai attacks in India, the brainchild is always found in the same place. It is high time we fight a decisive battle against the perpetrators and supporters of terrorism. Who can’t control their country, are having problems with what is going on in India, " Modi slams Pakistan.

details.title: India working towards USD 5 trillion economy, says Modi as concluding remark
details.content: India has started working towards becoming a USD 5 Trillion economy. We are working on bettering infrastructure, investment and export, says Modi. He concludes his speech by inviting Trump to visit India with family.

details.title: PM Modi leaves the stadium with Trump
details.content:
PM #NarendraModi along with US President #DonaldTrump taking a round in the stadium. #AIRPics: Souvagya | #HowdyModi pic.twitter.com/JGBtgs4djV

— All India Radio News (@airnewsalerts) September 22, 2019

details.title: Thanks to Modi, today world stands with India: Amit Shah
details.content:
The message to the world is loud and clear that this #NewIndia will leave no stone unturned to keep our country safe and united.

Thanks to PM @narendramodi ji’s leadership, entire world today stands firmly with India in its decisive fight against the menance of terrorism.

— Amit Shah (@AmitShah) September 22, 2019

The USA Loves India! https://t.co/xlfnWafxpg

— Donald J. Trump (@realDonaldTrump) September 22, 2019
